languages.text: "Я в отчаянном положении. Мне нужны убежище и целитель".
"My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."
languages.original_text: "Я в отчаянном положении. Мне нужны убежище и целитель".

traits.locale_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."
"My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

languages.text: 「切羽詰まってるんだ。シェルターと治療師がいる」
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: 「切羽詰まってるんだ。シェルターと治療師がいる」

languages.text: “我已经走投无路了。我需要找个安全的地方，再找个治疗师。”
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: “我已经走投无路了。我需要找个安全的地方，再找个治疗师。”

languages.text: «Mi situación es desesperada. Necesito refugio y un médico».
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: «Mi situación es desesperada. Necesito refugio y un médico».

languages.text: "Ich bin in einer verzweifelten Lage. Ich brauche einen Unterschlupf und einen Heiler."
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin in einer verzweifelten Lage. Ich brauche einen Unterschlupf und einen Heiler."

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|désespéré|désespérée}. J'ai besoin d'un abri et d'un guérisseur. »
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|désespéré|désespérée}. J'ai besoin d'un abri et d'un guérisseur. »

languages.text: "Çaresiz bir hâldeyim. Bir sığınağa ve şifacıya ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: "My situation is desperate. I need shelter and a healer."

traits.locale_text: "Çaresiz bir hâldeyim. Bir sığınağa ve şifacıya ihtiyacım var."
